episodes.title: Cults: Indoctrination, Brainwashing, and Abuse - Chloe's Experience - The Lady and the Trans Podcast
episodes.description:
When Chloe first moved to Los Angeles, she wanted to be an actor. She didn't know she was Chloe yet, was just a lost 'boy' making her way in the world, and she stumbled onto what seemed like a free ticket to success: a 'casting director' who was teaching a free acting class to find new talent. But from there, she entered into a world of lies, deceit, misery, abuse, mental manipulation, trauma, and more.

This episode breaks down her experience in the cult, how cults function, the mental manipulation tactics employed to keep people trapped, and the fallout from the whole ordeal.

A MASSIVE trigger warning: This episode features descriptions of SA and other forms of abuse.

The Original Blog: https://thejustinxavier.wordpress.com/2016/10/12/my-true-experience-in-a-los-angeles-rape-cult/ (SUPER TRIGGER WARNING)

Like, subscribe, and leave us a review for more from Lady and the Trans Podcast. New episode every other Friday!
